name: FROGO!
description:
FROGO!

Electro - mechanical frog on a quest to destroy glass balls.

60 levels of the increasingly difficult and hostile board game puzzle action!

How do you play?

Create a path for your mechanical frog and make a waypoint to destroy all glass balls on the board.

Avoid given obstacles and save/renew your health status while the enemy turrets are shooting at you and weakens integrity of the frogs mechanism.

Wind up the frog from time to time to have enough potential to reach the finish and solve the level.

Think as many steps ahead as you can!

It's challenging to finish all levels and only calm and strong minds can do it.
Are you one of those few people who will proudly say 'I solved all FROGO! levels? Can you really do it?
